channel.title: CVE Feed for Bender / ebee -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Bender / ebee -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-34602|2024-09-17T01:46:57.289Z -- bender%20%2F%20ebee -- cc612
item.description: In Bender/ebee Charge Controllers in multiple versions are prone to Command injection via Web interface. An authenticated attacker could enter shell commands into some input fields that are executed with root privileges.

item.title: CVE-2021-34587|2024-09-17T02:58:12.456Z -- bender%20%2F%20ebee -- cc612
item.description: In Bender/ebee Charge Controllers in multiple versions a long URL could lead to webserver crash. The URL is used as input of an sprintf to a stack variable.
